message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $100 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for $95. Don't miss out on this great opportunity!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you coming down to $95.  I'm really interested in the product but unfortunately, $95 is still a bit out of my price range.  Would you be willing to go down to $85?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider $90 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $90 is closer, but I'm still stuck at $85. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $87.50?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I'm willing to negotiate further. How about $89? This brings us closer together.
